description:
Revert 199375 "re-land cc: Switched ContentLayerUpdaters to use ..."

Causing interactive_ui_tests DeleteSourceDetached_0 to be flaky.

http://build.chromium.org/p/chromium.win/builders/Win%20Aura%20Tests%20%283%29/builds/2979

This actually looks like a reasonable stack trace..

[3216:640:0510/012136:2397657:ERROR:desktop_root_window_host_win.cc(697)] NOT IMPLEMENTED
LEAK: 4 WebCoreNode
[3216:640:0510/012137:2398515:FATAL:lock.cc(41)] Check failed: !owned_by_thread_.
Backtrace:
base::debug::StackTrace::StackTrace [0x100839C1+33]
logging::LogMessage::~LogMessage [0x100F6CCE+94]

messages.text:
